summary: TRANSMISSION SLIPS DURING THE 1-2 UP SHIFT AT MODERATE THROTTLE INPUT CAUSING A DISTINCTIVE CLUNK AND COULD BE A POSSIBLE SAFETY CONCERN ON TWO WHEEL DRIVE VEHICLES ON SLIPPERY ROADS, WHERE AS VEHICLE LOSS OF CONTROL COULD OCCUR WHEN TRANSMISSION ENGAGES.  VEHICLE RETURNED TO DEALER TWICE WITH CONCERN, ONE ATTEMPT TO FIX WITH REPLACEMENT OF TRANSMISSION OUTPUT SHAFT. THIS DID NOT HELP. *JB
